Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ReadWriteListener
    - Refactored to ReadWriteListener. This class will stay until version 3.0, when it will be removed.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.StateListener
    - Refactored to DeviceStateListener.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManager.StateListener
    - Refactored to ManagerStateListener.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.WriteBuilder
    - Use WriteBuilder instead. This will be removed in v 3.0
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.UpdateLoop
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode
    This is deprecated in favor of BleScanApi.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNodeConfig.allowCallsFromAllThreads
    - This value is not used anymore. Just left here so we don't cause build errors.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManagerConfig.allowManagerStatePolling
    - Use BleManagerConfig.defaultStatePollRate instead. If you want it disabled, set that option to Interval.DISABLED.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDeviceConfig.defaultAuthTransaction
    This is still here only so we don't break current builds. It will be removed in version 3. Use BleDeviceConfig.defaultAuthFactory instead, so each device gets it's own instance, instead of sharing the same one. If you are connecting to more than 1 device at a time, SweetBlue will throw an Exception.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDeviceConfig.defaultInitTransaction
    This is still here only so we don't break current builds. It will be removed in version 3. Use BleDeviceConfig.defaultInitFactory instead, so each device gets it's own instance, instead of sharing the same one. If you are connecting to more than 1 device at a time, SweetBlue will throw an Exception.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.FutureData.EMPTY 
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManagerConfig.forcePreLollipopScan
    Use BleManagerConfig.scanApi with BleScanApi.PRE_LOLLIPOP instead.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManagerConfig.scanMode
    This is deprecated in favor of BleScanApi. If this is not null, SweetBlue will set BleManagerConfig.scanApi automatically from this setting.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.K_Util.abortReliableWrite(BleDevice)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DescriptorFilter.DescriptorEvent.characteristc()
    - Method name is misspelled, but left in here so as to not break any current implementations.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.M_Util.connect(BleDevice, boolean, Context, BluetoothGattCallback)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.K_Util.createBond(BleDevice)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils_Byte.fileToBinaryDataList(Context, String, int)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils_Byte.getIntValue(byte[]) 
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.L_Util.isAdvertisingSupportedByChipset(BleManager)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode.isLollipopScanMode()
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils_ScanRecord.parseScanRecord(byte[], Pointer<Integer>, Pointer<Integer>, List<UUID>, SparseArray<byte[]>, Map<UUID, byte[]>)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Utils_ScanRecord.parseServiceUuids(byte[])
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.readBatteryLevel(byte[], BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    - Use any of the read() methods which accept a DescriptorFilter instead. This way, you're not limited to just the battery service/char
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.readBatteryLevel(byte[], UUID, BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    - Use any of the read() methods which accept a DescriptorFilter instead, so you're not locked into the default service/char for battery.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.L_Util.requestConnectionPriority(BleDevice, int)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.L_Util.requestMtu(BleDevice, int)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManager.setListener_DeviceState(BleDevice.StateListener)
    - This will be removed in version 3. It has been refactored to DeviceStateListener.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.setListener_ReadWrite(BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    - This will be removed in version 3. Use ReadWriteListener instead (it was refactored to be in it's own class file, rather than an inner class).
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManager.setListener_ReadWrite(BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    - This will be removed in version 3. Use ReadWriteListener instead (it was refactored to be in it's own class file, rather than an inner class).
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.setListener_State(BleDevice.StateListener)
    - This will be removed in version 3. It has been refactored to DeviceStateListener.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManager.setListener_State(BleManager.StateListener)
    - This will be removed in version 3. This class has been refactored to ManagerStateListener.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.WriteBuilder.setReadWriteListener_dep(BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    This will be removed in v3. It's safe, and ok to use this method until then.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.L_Util.startNativeScan(BleManager, int, Interval, L_Util.ScanCallback)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.M_Util.startNativeScan(BleManager, int, Interval, L_Util.ScanCallback)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.compat.L_Util.stopNativeScan(BleManager)
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.write(BleDevice.WriteBuilder)
    - Use BleDevice.write(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.WriteBuilder) instead. This will be removed in v3.0
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.write(BleDevice.WriteBuilder, BleDevice.ReadWriteListener)
    - Use BleDevice.write(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.WriteBuilder, ReadWriteListener) instead. This will be removed in v3.0
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode.HIGH_POWER
    - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.HIGH_POWER instead.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode.LOW_POWER
    - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.LOW_POWER instead.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleScanMode.MEDIUM_POWER
    - This will be removed in v3. Use BleScanPower.MEDIUM_POWER instead.
    com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.NotificationListener.Type.PSUEDO_NOTIFICATION
    - This is only marked as deprecated because it's misspelled. Rather than cause a breaking change to rename it, it's marked as deprecated, and will be renamed in v3.
